description: Lists the billing views available for a given time period. Every Amazon Web Services account has a unique PRIMARY billing view that represents the billing data available by default. Accounts that use Billing Conductor also have BILLING_GROUP billing views representing pro forma costs associated with each created billing group.

parameters.name: activeTimeRange
parameters.description: The time range for the billing views listed. PRIMARY billing view is always listed. BILLING_GROUP billing views are listed for time ranges when the associated billing group resource in Billing Conductor is active. The time range must be within one calendar month. The inclusive time range start date. The inclusive time range end date.

nested_params.name: activeAfterInclusive
nested_params.description: The inclusive time range start date.

nested_params.name: activeBeforeInclusive
nested_params.description: The inclusive time range end date.

parameters.name: arns
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that can be used to uniquely identify the billing view. (string) ---

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that can be used to uniquely identify the billing view.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: A list of names of the Billing view.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the billing view.

nested_items.name: ownerAccountId
nested_items.description: The list of owners of the Billing view.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use on subsequent calls to list billing views.
